application_description.message: Customize the colors and background of your Google Meet

missing_text.message:
You must enter a link that ends in: 
.jpg | .jpeg | .png | .webp | .avif | .gif | .svg | .tiff | .bmp

page_denied.message: You can only do that within a call.

game_without_connection.message: Play until the connection is restored

game_instructions.message: Use the ⇦ and ⇨ Arrows or A and D keys to move, ⎵ to shoot.

game_msg3.message: Click or press Spacebar to Play Again

thanks.message: Thanks for using Simple Custom Meet!
